spec: Normalize a CSV-like input that uses inconsistent delimiters and quoting (commas, semicolons, stray double quotes) into valid RFC4180 CSV with comma delimiters and properly quoted fields.
inputs:
Name; Age; City
"John Doe"; 29; "New York"
Jane, Smith;30;Los Angeles

id; name; notes
1, "Widget A, red; 10cm"; "Top seller"
2; Gadget B, blue; On sale

id;name;address
1;O'Connor, Sean;"123 Main St., Apt "5B""
2;Lee;456 Oak St., Apt 2

sku;stock;location
A100;10;
B200;;"Warehouse; B"
C300;5;Main Warehouse
outputs:
Name,Age,City
John Doe,29,New York
"Jane, Smith",30,Los Angeles

id,name,notes
1,"Widget A, red; 10cm",Top seller
2,"Gadget B, blue",On sale

id,name,address
1,"O'Connor, Sean","123 Main St., Apt ""5B"""
2,Lee,"456 Oak St., Apt 2"

sku,stock,location
A100,10,
B200,,"Warehouse; B"
C300,5,Main Warehouse
